=basic apply=

apply(X, MARGIN, FUN, ...)

# e.g. Construct a 5x6 matrix
X <- matrix(rnorm(30), nrow=5, ncol=6)
# Sum the values of each column with `apply()`
apply(X, 2, sum)


=lapply -- lists =

lapply( list, function(x)  [some operation on x as x goes through each member of the list](x) )
# returns a list
